survey_name: Virtual Fitness Class Participation and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of virtual fitness classes to understand their preferences, satisfaction levels, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to simplify data analysis.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in virtual fitness classes?

questions.question_text: What types of virtual fitness classes do you typically attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to capture diverse preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an 'Other' open-text option.

script.question_text: What types of virtual fitness classes do you typically attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a virtual fitness class? (Rank top 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question to prioritize preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Ranking with an 'Other' open-text option.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a virtual fitness class? (Rank top 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of virtual fitness classes you have attended?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of virtual fitness classes you have attended?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', '3-5 times per week', or '1-2 times per week' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for virtual fitness classes?
